ingredients: 10 lbs. Bairds English two-row Pale Ale malted barley
1 lb. Bairds English two-row 50-60 crystal malt
1.2 oz. Centennial hop pellets (90 min. boil)
1.2 oz. Centennial hop pellets (60 min. boil)
1.2 oz. Cascade hop pellets (10 min. boil)
1.2 oz. Cascade hop pellets(end of boil)
name: Vail Pale Ale
